meanings.sent1: The nonalcoholic drinks at the party were popular with the guests.
meanings.sent2: She ordered a nonalcoholic beverage to enjoy with her meal.
meanings.sent3: The nonalcoholic punch was so tasty, it disappeared in minutes!
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as refreshing as a glass of nonalcoholic lemonade on a hot day.
meanings.sent5: The nonalcoholic options on the menu made it easy for everyone to find something they liked.

meanings.definition: Not involving or related to alcohol.
meanings.sent1: The nonalcoholic event was a great opportunity for everyone to have fun together.
meanings.sent2: He preferred nonalcoholic activities like hiking and painting.
meanings.sent3: The nonalcoholic jokes at the party had everyone laughing.
meanings.sent4: Her voice was as clear and pure as a nonalcoholic choir singing in harmony.
meanings.sent5: The nonalcoholic atmosphere of the library made it a peaceful place to study.
